name: TcmExtensions
body:
### TcmExtensions

TcmExtensions is a set of code libraries and applications which do various things related to the [SDL Tridion Content Manager product](http://www.sdl.com/products/tridion/).

Most of the projects were simply inspired or created by need when executing Tridion projects.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
